text: Piptostigma calophyllum is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in Cameroon and Gabon. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Cheek, M. 2004. Piptostigma calophyllum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
